name: Mango Smoothie
description: Sour and sweet taste in it can boost ur energy for day.

name: Banana Smoothie
description: Its like an island heaven, rich and delicious and highly nutritious, sweetened only by raw agave nectar.

name: Kiwi Strawberry Smoothie
description: Fruity goodness for smoothie lovers!!!

name: Blueberry Smoothie
description: Ever wonder blueberry should be mixed with what? Here you goes, this is a delicious way to use up your blueberries.

name: Chocolate Devil's Food Cake
description: Chocolate-lovers, raise your hands (and forks)! This cake, made extra moist with oil, features a fudge frosting and photo-worthy chocolate shards, along with a secret chocolate-enhancing ingredient.

name: Red Velvet Cake
description: Surrounded with cream cheese frosting. This mysterious red cake has magical powers for lovers.

name: Better Than Sex Cake
description: A very sickly sweet and delicious cake. Nobody can stop eating it after the first bite!

name: Carrot Cake
description: Don't be confused with its name. This cake does not contain only carrot, but also shredded coconut, crushed pineapple and walnuts in it.

name: Oreo Cake
description: What's the better one when this cake is filled with cream cheese frosting, chocolate cake, cookies and cream filling?

name: Strawberry Cake
description: Eating this cake make you happy! Its pinkness is so nostalgic and sweet. Never ever missed this.

name: Apple juice
description: It keeps doctor away, keeps you hydrated, prevents sign of premature aging and many more. Apple are low in sodium, fat and cholesterol.

name: Cucumber juice
description: Refreshing cucumber juice is a perfect antidote to the summer heat.

name: Lemon juice
description: Lemon juice is delicious and healthy. It boosts your intake of vitamin C, helps lower blood pressure, promotes skin health and digestion.

name: Orange juice
description: There's nothing better than a glass of freshly squeezed orange juice. Let's load up the vitamin C.

name: Papaya juice
description: Papaya juice is full of antioxidants, vitamins and minerals. Papaya gives you 39kcal which makes it the best fruit in reducing cholestrol.

name: Pineapple juice
description: Pineapple juice is 500% more effective at helping you to stop coughing compare to cough syrup.It contains a specific type of enzyme which eradicate bacteria.

name: Taco
description: An easy recipe that is easy to be made and mouth-watering.

name: Burger
description: Variety of sauces is added along with a seducing cheese. Yummy yummy!

name: Chicken Chop
description: Super tender chicken wrapped in a crunchy batter, smothered in a rich mushroom sauce.

name: Pork Chop
description: Crazy combination of pork chop with raspberry. Time spent on cooking this is quite long.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: Perfect weeknight dinner! Packed with crispy bacon and mixed with the creamiest carbonara sauce, this dish is a total knockout.

name: Lemon Garlic Parmesan Shrimp Pasta
description: Fresh shrimp is cooked in a buttery lemon garlic sauce and gets tossed in fresh parmesan cheese and pasta.
